00022 #ifndef restcgi_apidefs_h
00023 #define restcgi_apidefs_h
00024 #ifdef _WIN32
00025 // Symbols to define for the preprocessor when compiling the code:
00026 //    RESTCGI_STATIC: to create static library
00027 //    RESTCGI_EXPORTS: to create DLL library
00028 //    nothing: when using (importing) the library in an application
00029 #  ifdef RESTCGI_STATIC
00030 #    define RESTCGI_API
00031 #    define RESTCGI_TMPL
00032 #  else
00033 #    ifdef RESTCGI_EXPORTS
00034 #      define RESTCGI_API __declspec(dllexport)
00035 #      define RESTCGI_TMPL
00036 #    else
00037 #      define RESTCGI_API __declspec(dllimport)
00038 #      define RESTCGI_TMPL extern
00039 #    endif
00040 #  endif
00041 #  pragma warning (disable: 4793)
00042 // Convert from linux API.
00043 #  define strcasecmp _stricmp
00044 #else
00045 #  define RESTCGI_API
00046 #  define RESTCGI_TMPL
00047 #endif /* _WIN32 */
00048 #endif
